title: "Short Term Fun" Meaning on Tinder & Other Dating Apps

steps.title: "Short term fun" means someone’s looking for a casual hookup with no strings attached.
steps.content: "Short term fun" means someone’s looking for a casual hookup with no strings attached. When you see this tag in someone’s Tinder, Bumble, or Hinge bio, the person is looking for a short term, casual relationship characterized by hookups and no strings attached. They aren’t looking for a committed relationship, but rather something that’s more carefree and casual. [1] X Research source They may still want to go out on a few dates to get a feel for you as a person. People use the short term fun tag to be clear that they’re looking for something casual. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Use short term fun to let others know you’re looking for something casual.
steps.content: Use short term fun to let others know you’re looking for something casual. When you’re swiping on dating apps and want to let your matches know that you aren’t looking for something serious and would prefer a casual fling or hookup, use the short term fun tag. Say “I’m just looking for short term fun” to explain that you want to explore something casual without any strings attached. Example: “Yeah, I’m just getting back in the dating scene so I’m not looking for anything serious. I prefer short term fun!” Example: “I’m more of a casual dater. I’ve tried long term and it’s not for me. Right now, I’m looking for short term fun.”

steps.title: “Figuring out my dating goals”
steps.content: “Figuring out my dating goals” On dating apps, this tag means that people are still trying to figure out what they want from a relationship. They’re likely indecisive and open to exploring, but don’t have any expectations. If you see this tag on a dating app, it means that someone is open to anything, as long as they have the opportunity to figure it out themselves.

steps.title: “Looking for fun”
steps.content: “Looking for fun” If someone has “looking for fun” in their Tinder bio, it means they’re looking for a casual hookup or friends with benefits . “Short term fun” tends to indicate that someone is looking for something more casual, while “looking for fun” can range from casual hookups to a situationship .

steps.title: “Short term, open to long”
steps.content: “Short term, open to long” When someone uses this tag on dating apps, it means they are looking for a short, casual relationship but are willing to explore a long-term, serious relationship if they find someone who checks their boxes. If you match with someone who has this tag, keep an open mind and see where things go.

steps.title: Be clear about what you want by establishing rules and boundaries.
steps.content: Be clear about what you want by establishing rules and boundaries. In a casual relationship , it is important to speak up for yourself and what you want. Establish clear rules and boundaries for the relationship and make sure things are fair for both partners. Ask questions about what they want out of the relationship, be honest about your intentions, and if your thoughts or feelings on the matter change, let them know so you can navigate the situation together. [3] X Research source Set your boundaries at the beginning of the relationship so you can prevent any potentially damaging behavior. This can be as simple as messaging your match and letting them know that you only date people who have been tested for sexually transmitted diseases.

steps.title: Accept the relationship for what it is.
steps.content: Accept the relationship for what it is. A casual relationship often lacks the same commitment as an exclusive relationship. If the person you’re dating has established that they’re looking for short-term fun, don’t expect them to be willing to drop everyone and make you their one and only partner. If you want something more exclusive, it may be time to swipe for another partner. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Use protection.
steps.content: Use protection. Since the relationship is casual, neither you nor your partner is entitled to commitment. If you know they’re sleeping with other people or you’re doing the same, use protection to prevent the spread of any unwanted sexually transmitted infections and prevent pregnancy. Having sex with multiple people increases your chances of getting an STI, so make sure you’re using protection in casual relationships.
